trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SEQ_00<tab>Nimie is eager to get to work on your dragonsung tool. ※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SEQ_01<tab>At your indication that you are braced for the trials ahead, Nimie divulges a few additional details as to what will be expected of you─most harrowingly, that a significant quantity of coating is required for your tool, and that you must provide no small number of materials accordingly. You had best take up your dragonsung tool right away if you are to present Denys with enough supplies for his goblin team.
※Please note that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SEQ_02<tab>Your toil is rewarded with pot upon pot of mysterious gobbiegoo, and at last you are able to present Nimie with a sufficiency of the substance. Thankfully, she makes short work of applying it, and you are soon the proud─albeit slightly disgusted─owner of an augmented dragonsung tool. Loftier heights await, however, as she and the other Skysteel engineers have more plans in store!

/var>180<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04F279960302 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> to Nimie.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Ever Skyward,” you will receive an augmented dragonsung tool for your current class of <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_A1_000_000<tab>Undertake this quest as another class.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_A2_000_000<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Be advised that once you have begun this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_100_002<tab>Please ensure that you have changed to your desired class before speaking with Nimie.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>In order to receive the quest “Ever Skyward,” you must have <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>You have already acquired <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Should you wish to augment a different tool, please change to a different class and speak with Nimie again.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_000<tab>Let's get to work, shall we? To review, the dragonsung tool you currently hold in your hand represents the third phase of the upgrade process. It started life as a prototype, which was upgraded to a proper Skysteel tool, then altered once more to take its current form.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_001<tab>At the moment, we possess the know-how and resources to upgrade it as far as the fifth phase─two phases beyond where it stands now.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_003<tab>If you're here for more work, you won't hear any complaints from me. To review, the dragonsung tool you currently have in hand represents the third phase of the upgrade process.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_100_003<tab>For phase four, so to speak, we'll need an absolutely massive amount of the aforementioned goblin-made gunk. Which means you'll have to provide easily pulped, mashed, and otherwise pulverized materials for their use in equal measure.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_110_003<tab>For phase four, so to speak, we'll need an absolutely massive amount of the aforementioned goblin-made gunk. Which means you'll have to provide easily pulped, mashed, and otherwise pulverized materials for their use in equal measure.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NEILLEMARD_000_005<tab>And remember─you'll want to make use of your dragonsung tool. The so-called bond between tool and wielder aside, we'll need to measure your wear patterns for future designs.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NEILLEMARD_000_006<tab>As he mentioned, Denys will be chained to his post in the manufactory for the foreseeable future, so it should be easy enough to find him once you have the materials─or before, should you need further clarification as to their nature.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_007<tab>Once you have a sufficiency of the substance in question, bring it to me together with the tool itself. I'll see that it's safely and properly applied, and you'll walk away with a cutting-edge creation like none have ever seen. Or smelled. But never mind that.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>First, use your dragonsung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>After receiving the appropriate goo from Denys, present it along with your tool to Nimie to complete the upgrade process.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>To craft materials, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Skysteel Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Skysteel Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when gathering.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained by speaking to Denys.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when fishing.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_200_029<tab>When making your final delivery to Nimie, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NEILLEMARD_000_008<tab>Feeling a bit at a loss, friend? I can hardly blame you─the process is not a simple one. Let us review: the first thing we ask of you is to procure the necessary raw materials by putting that tool of yours to good use.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NEILLEMARD_000_009<tab>Once you have a sufficient quantity, deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory─his team of goblins will liquefy them in due time. Present the pots of goo you receive in exchange to Nimie along with the tool in question, and she'll see the process completed.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>First, use your dragonsung tool to craft or harvest the necessary materials, and deliver them to Denys inside the manufactory.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>After receiving the necessary augmentation unit from Denys, present it along with your tool to Nimie to complete the upgrade process.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>To craft materials, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sidequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Skysteel Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate applicable recipes.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when crafting. Certain ingredients required to craft the items in question must be purchased via scrips or skybuilders' scrips.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>Materials needed to upgrade a botanist's or miner's primary tool can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Skysteel Tools<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gathering Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_036<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when gathering.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>Upgrading a fisher's primary tool requires the use of specialized bait. This can be obtained by speaking to Denys.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_000_038<tab>Furthermore, please note that you must have your dragonsung tool equipped when fishing.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_SYSTEM_200_039<tab>When making your final delivery to Nimie, the tool to be upgraded should be placed in your inventory or Armoury Chest, and not equipped.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_100_010<tab>All ready, you say? Excellent. I hope it wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> much trouble for you to track down all those obscure materials. In any event, if you wouldn't mind parting with your tool and the copious amounts of goo you presumably have on your person, I'll get right to work.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_010<tab>Curious indeed. I can't wait to get back to my workshop and take a closer look. The job shouldn't take long, so why don't you just wait here?

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_011<tab>Apologies for the delay, but I suspect you'll find it was worth the wait. Behold: your dragonsung tool now looks and works─and smells─like never before! I must say, this process was as educational as it was inspiring. You have my thanks for moving things along.

TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NEILLEMARD_000_012<tab>You have my gratitude as well. With your cooperation, my colleagues and I have achieved a true technological breakthrough that would never have been possible otherwise.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_013<tab>Thanks to your efforts, we've reached another malmstone toward realizing the full potential of our tools.
TEXT_LUCKHT012_03893_NIMIE_000_014<tab>But I'm certain you'd rather see for yourself. Take your augmented dragonsung tool with our blessing─and may it serve you well.
